data.actual_result: Ellipses highlight if there's a mention after the ellipses in the message
data.short_description: Ellipses in in-app notifications highlight if there's a mention after the ellipses
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn notifications for a channel to "All messages" - Have someone send a long enough message that it ellipses - Verify that the ellipses isn't highlighted - Have the same person send the same message again, but this time ping you at the end - Observe the ellipses in the in-app notification
